name: NPR
text: George Clooney on the legacy he hopes to impart to his two kids: "If you only in your lifetime challenge people with power and defend people with less power, if you only do that in your life, you will be a success." https://t.co/roY2CYQCuA

name: NPR
text: California hospitals are stretched to their limits as COVID-19 cases climb and ICUs fill up. https://t.co/C3L7tps1wE

name: NPR
text: Congress is close to a deal on a handful of higher education measures that would provide meaningful help to marginalized students, students of color and many of the schools that serve them. https://t.co/46pjnEUCQ2

name: NPR
text: The measures include restoring Pell Grant eligibility for would-be students who are incarcerated.

name: NPR
text: Inmates are among the least educated people in America, but few prisons offer opportunities beyond a GED. An @npr_ed comic from 2018 dives into a timely question: What if people behind bars had access to federal money to help pay for college? https://t.co/KkdYv0XF48

name: NPR
text: More than 1 million people went through checkpoints at U.S. airports on each of the past two days. That's down considerably from a year ago, but still an increase over typical pandemic travel levels. https://t.co/Fwv2nKhKuk

name: NPR
text: Dozens of children were rescued after being abducted on Saturday in the second mass kidnapping of schoolchildren in Nigeria's Katsina state in eight days. https://t.co/N37ahGUN7y

name: NPR
text: The arrival of the first shipments of a COVID-19 vaccine was celebrated this past week by those who've been caring for patients since the early days of the pandemic. Some tens of thousands of healthcare workers were immunized. https://t.co/yUZaL9YUNQ

name: NPR
text: Rocket attacks by "Iran-backed militias" into an area housing the U.S. embassy in Iraq killed at least one local civilian and damaged the embassy compound, according to U.S. diplomatic sources. https://t.co/qOaLQKGVEM

name: NPR
text: RT @nprmusic: What role can hip-hop play in reforming â€“ or entirely dismantling â€“ mass incarceration? Rapper Noname and activist Mariame Kaba joined @LouderThanARiot to discuss making revolution irresistible. https://t.co/ysg5iBdFWx

name: NPR
text: NPR Music's classical editor traces the high points of a year spent listening to new albums that offered comfort and confrontation in counterpoint with the relentless world outside the headphones. https://t.co/jOnW8Y22xX
